comic-files.confirm-start-message: Are you sure you want to import the {count, plural, =1{one comic} other{# comic files}} into the library?

import-comic-files.confirmation-message: Are you sure you want to import the selected {count, plural, =1{comic} other{# comics}}?
import-comic-files.effect-failure: Failed to send comic files for import.
import-comic-files.effect-success: Submitted {count, plural, =1{one comic file} other{# comic files}} for import.

load-comic-files.effect-success: Found {files, plural, =1{one comic file} other{# comic files}} in {directories, plural, =1{one directory} other{# directories}}.
load-comic-files.effect-failure: Failed to find any comic files.

comic-files.page-title: Import Comics: {selected, plural, =1{One} other{#}} Of {count, plural, =1{One Comic} other{# Comics}} Selected

tooltip.select-all: Select all comic files for import (ctrl+a).
tooltip.skip-blocking-pages: Skip marked blocked pages as deleted (currently {skipBlockingPages, select, true{ON} other{OFF}})
tooltip.skip-metadata: Skip processing metadata (currently {skipMetadata, select, true{ON} other{OFF}})
tooltip.start-import: Start importing the selected comic files (ctrl+i).
tooltip.toggle-file-lookup-form: Toggle the comic file lookup form.

scrape-filename.effect-success: Metadata {found, select, true{was scraped} other{was not scraped}} from the filename.
